official_title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office and Federal Building in Huntington, West Virginia as the Sidney L. Christie Federal Building.

summary.text: Designates the United States Post Office and Federal building in Huntington, West Virginia, as the "Sidney L. Christie Federal Building."

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office and Federal Building in Huntington, West Virginia as the Sidney L. Christie Federal Building.
